name: 里奇·马勒瑞
introduction: Starting out his career in distribution, Rich Mallery's obsession with film led him to branch out to more behind-the-scenes roles where he has produced several feature films including "Darling Nikki," "Hunter: Future Cop" and "Samurai Cop: Deadly Vengeance", the sequel to the fan favorite 1980's film which he also co-wrote. Rich soon took his love of filmmaking to the next level; writing, producing and directing his first feature "Sociopathia," a raw and visceral horror film in the vein of genre classics like "Maniac" and "Repulsion." Soon after Rich Mallery followed up his critically acclaimed debut by writing and directing several films including "Holy Terror", "Sinful", "Wicked Game", and the soon to be released "Felines", a dark and gritty drama/thriller in the vein of "Black Swan" and "White Girl".
